name: Scroll Back To Top Button
author: Sayful Islam

sections.description:
The plugin adds a floating navigation button right bottom in the footer of your site that only appears when you scroll the page down, and when clicked gently roll the site to the top. All this without any modification to your template.

Full Feature Set

  • Very lightweight, Total content is less than 1 kb and load when the site load
  • No dependency, Written in Vanilla JavaScript
  • Support all major browsers including Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Edge, IE9 and higher
  • Five SVG icon type
  • Two icon shape: Square or Circle
  • Unlimited Colors for background and icon
sections.installation:
Installing the plugins is just like installing other WordPress plugins. If you don’t know how to install plugins, please review the option below:

  • From your WordPress dashboard go to Plugins > Add New.
  • Search for Scroll to Top in Search Plugins box.
  • Find the WordPress Plugin named Scroll to Top by Sayful Islam.
  • Click Install Now to install the Scroll to Top Plugin.
  • The plugin will begin to download and install.
  • Now just click Activate to activate the plugin.

If you still need help. visit WordPress codex
sections.faq: Do you have questions or issues with Scroll to Top? Ask for support here
sections.changelog:
version 2.9.0 – 2018-02-19

  • Fix – Fixed issue not working in some browser.
  • Tweak – Update core code.

version 2.8.1 – 2017-07-11

  • Fix – Fixed issue not working with some theme.

version 2.8.0 – 2017-07-10

  • Removed – Removed dependency over jQuery.

version 2.7.0 – 2017-01-19

  • Removed – Removed dependency over scrollup jQuery library.
  • Added – Replaced image with SVG icon.
  • Added – Five SVG icon type.
  • Added – Two icon shape: Square or Circle.
  • Added – Unlimited Colors for background and icon.

version 2.5

  • Added color changing options for button

version 2.4

  • Fix bug on Easing Effect
  • Fix bug on Scrollup Button Animations
  • Added three new button type

version 2.3

  • Redesign with modern WordPress code

version 2.2

  • Three new options have been added.
  • You can change button size and button position.

version 2.1

  • Nine new easing-effects have been added.

version 2.0

  • More lighter than previous version.
  • New option page has been included where you can change default easing effect, scroll speed, scroll distance, hover title.

version 1.0

  • Initial release.

sections.reviews:
Written in Vanilla Javascript!

By shirtguy72 on March 17, 2022

A few reviews here do NOT reflect to what an AMAZING plugin Scroll Back To Top Button really is! Thanks, appreciate your work! If I may? One suggestion in a future update: Give us a place in the UI to add our own custom CSS.

Most Elegant

By ib.property on April 18, 2020

It does not disturb the style of the most elegant site. Excellent function to report the length of the post.

Не работает

By Mario62rus on November 7, 2017

Ни работает ни в одном браузере кроме Yandex Browser.

short_description: This is just a very simple plugin to have a scroll back to top button throughout your whole blog/site.
